name: First Internet
description:
First Internet benefits from a unique combination of experience and fresh insight. The team is made up of bright, young, online marketing, design and development experts poised to breathe life into your digital marketing strategy and push your business forward. First Internet was founded in 1998 by Stephen Alexander in Hale, Greater Manchester. Originally focussing on hosting, the company quickly branched out into website design and web development.
We have worked across all areas of digital marketing and work hard to help our clients achieve their goals through long term relationships and strategic planning and implementation of best practice.
